str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.

str2: An apparently primary word; a measure, literally or figuratively; by implication, a limited portion.
